data.actual_result: The slowmode there is spelled as "slow mode".
data.expected_result: Like every other place, slowmode is spelled as "slowmode".
data.short_description: Slowmode is spelled as "slow mode" in channel settings when it hasn't been enabled.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open channel settings of a server where you have manage channels permissions. - Scroll down to the bottom and observe the text that says "Slow mode is off."
